list_definition.definition: to lead, direct or show the way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I don’t know how to get to your house – I’ll need someone to guide me

The teacher guided the child’s hand as she wrote.

list_definition.definition: a person who shows the way to go, points out interesting things etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A guide will show you round the castle.

list_definition.definition: (also guidebook) a book which contains information for tourists
something which informs, directs or influences.
